credit_line: Museum purchase from James B. Ford and Peter Cooper Hewitt Estate Funds
title: Studies for a Still Life
provenance: Le Corbusier (Charles Edouard Jeanneret-Gris), prior to 1936
medium: Graphite and crayon on white wove paper, mounted on canvas
description: Preliminary layout sketches for painting(?), six uncolored on upper 2/3rds, and two colored on lower 1/3rd.  All feature accordian details, and possible bottle/tea kettle/percolator forms, among other shapes.
name: Drawing
